title: "Grant awarded to develop artificial intelligence to improve stroke screening and treatment"
excerpt: "New artificial intelligence technology that uses a common CT angiography (CTA) as opposed to the more advanced imaging normally required to help identify patients who could benefit from endovascular stroke therapy (EST) is being developed at UTHealth."
